text: Peter Curtis Lamont (12 November 1929 â€“ 18 December 2020) was a British set decorator, art director, and production designer. He was known for working on many James Bond movies from Goldfinger (1964) to Casino Royale (2006). He also was the production designer for Titanic (1997), winning him an Academy Award. Lamont died on 18 December 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Academy Award winners Category:Satellite Award winners Category:British artists Category:Businesspeople from London Category:Set designers
title: Peter Lamont
